ROOT.ds_data: SELECT V.V_ID, V.V_NAME || '线路' AS V_NAME, ISNULL(CHEAVY, 0) AS CHEAVY, ISNULL(COVER, 0) AS COVER FROM (SELECT DISTINCT V.V_ID, V_NAME from "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_VOLTAGE" V ON D.VOLID = V.V_ID WHERE DTID = 1) V LEFT JOIN ( SELECT D.VOLID, COUNT(DISTINCT YCEVENT.DEVICEID) AS COVER FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE YCEVENT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D ON YCEVENT.DEVICEID = D.DEV_ID WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DTID = 1 AND LOADRATE > 100 GROUP BY D.VOLID ) X ON V.V_ID = X.VOLID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT D.VOLID, COUNT(DISTINCT YCEVENT.DEVICEID) AS CHEAVY FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE YCEVENT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D ON YCEVENT.DEVICEID = D.DEV_ID WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DTID = 1 AND LOADRATE > 80 AND LOADRATE < 100 GROUP BY D.VOLID ) Y ON V.V_ID = Y.VOLID ORDER BY V_ID
ROOT.ds_data_history: SELECT V.V_ID, V.V_NAME || '线路' AS V_NAME, ISNULL(COVER, 0) AS COVER, CASE WHEN TOTALNUM IS NULL OR X.COVER IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ROUND(TO_CHAR(ISNULL(X.COVER, 0)) / TOTALNUM, 3) * 100 || '%' END AS OVERRATE, TOTALMINUTE AS MINUTE, DAYS, TO_CHAR(LASTTIME, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS LASTTIME, MAXLOADRATE FROM ( SELECT V.V_ID, V_NAME, COUNT(1) AS TOTALNUM from "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_VOLTAGE" V ON D.VOLID = V.V_ID WHERE DTID = 1 GROUP BY V.V_ID, V_NAME ) V LEFT JOIN ( SELECT D.VOLID, COUNT(DISTINCT YCEVENT.DEVICEID) AS COVER, SUM(DATEDIFF(SS,STARTTIME, CASE WHEN ENDTIME IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE ENDTIME END)) AS TOTALMINUTE, MAX(STARTTIME) AS LASTTIME, MAX(LOADRATE) || '%' AS MAXLOADRATE, COUNT(DISTINCT TO_CHAR(STARTTIME,'YYYYMMDD')) AS DAYS FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE YCEVENT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D ON YCEVENT.DEVICEID = D.DEV_ID WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DTID = 1 AND LOADRATE > 80 GROUP BY D.VOLID ) X ON V.V_ID = X.VOLID ORDER BY V_ID
ROOT.ds_highover: SELECT DEVICEID, TO_CHAR(MAXITIME, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS STARTTIME, Y.D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP AS CURVALUE, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.DEVICEID ORDER BY MAXCURRENT DESC) AS RN, MAXITIME, A.DEVICEID, D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE A JOIN( SELECT DEVICEID, D5000NAME, COUNT(1) AS CNUM, SUM(DATEDIFF(SS, STARTTIME, ISNULL(ENDTIME, GETDATE()))) AS SUMTIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE YCEVENT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D ON YCEVENT.DEVICEID = D.DEV_ID WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DTID = 1 AND VOLID = {2} AND LOADRATE > 100 GROUP BY DEVICEID, D5000NAME ) B ON A.DEVICEID = B.DEVICEID AND STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND LOADRATE > 100 ) Y WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY STARTTIME, DEVICENAME
ROOT.ds_highover_history: SELECT DEVICEID, TO_CHAR(MAXITIME, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS STARTTIME, Y.D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP AS CURVALUE, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME, DAYS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.DEVICEID ORDER BY MAXCURRENT DESC) AS RN, MAXITIME, A.DEVICEID, D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME, DAYS FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE A JOIN( SELECT DEVICEID, D5000NAME, COUNT(1) AS CNUM, SUM(DATEDIFF(SS, STARTTIME, ISNULL(ENDTIME, GETDATE()))) AS SUMTIME, COUNT(DISTINCT TO_CHAR(STARTTIME, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS DAYS FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE YCEVENT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D ON YCEVENT.DEVICEID = D.DEV_ID WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DTID = 1 AND VOLID = {2} AND LOADRATE > 100 GROUP BY DEVICEID, D5000NAME ) B ON A.DEVICEID=B.DEVICEID AND STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND LOADRATE > 100 ) Y WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY STARTTIME, DEVICENAME
ROOT.ds_over: SELECT DEVICEID, TO_CHAR(MAXITIME, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS STARTTIME, Y.D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP AS CURVALUE, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.DEVICEID ORDER BY MAXCURRENT DESC) AS RN, MAXITIME, A.DEVICEID, D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE A JOIN( SELECT DEVICEID, D5000NAME, COUNT(1) AS CNUM, SUM(DATEDIFF(SS, STARTTIME, ISNULL(ENDTIME, GETDATE()))) AS SUMTIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE YCEVENT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D ON YCEVENT.DEVICEID = D.DEV_ID WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DTID = 1 AND VOLID = {2} AND LOADRATE BETWEEN 80 AND 100 GROUP BY DEVICEID, D5000NAME ) B ON A.DEVICEID=B.DEVICEID AND STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND LOADRATE BETWEEN 80 AND 100 ) Y WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY STARTTIME, DEVICENAME
ROOT.ds_over_history: SELECT DEVICEID, TO_CHAR(MAXITIME, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS STARTTIME, Y.D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP AS CURVALUE, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME, DAYS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.DEVICEID ORDER BY MAXCURRENT DESC) AS RN, MAXITIME, A.DEVICEID, D5000NAME, DEVICENAME, MAXP, MAXCURRENT, LOADRATE, CNUM, SUMTIME, DAYS FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE A JOIN( SELECT DEVICEID, D5000NAME, COUNT(1) AS CNUM, SUM(DATEDIFF(SS, STARTTIME, ISNULL(ENDTIME, GETDATE()))) AS SUMTIME, COUNT(DISTINCT TO_CHAR(STARTTIME, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS DAYS FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_LINE YCEVENT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE" D ON YCEVENT.DEVICEID = D.DEV_ID WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DTID = 1 AND VOLID = {2} AND LOADRATE BETWEEN 80 AND 100 GROUP BY DEVICEID, D5000NAME ) B ON A.DEVICEID=B.DEVICEID AND STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND LOADRATE BETWEEN 80 AND 100 ) Y WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY STARTTIME, DEVICENAME
ROOT.ds_record_year: SELECT STARTTIME, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, MAXP AS CURVALUE, DATEDIFF(SS,STARTTIME,CASE WHEN ENDTIME IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE ENDTIME END) AS MINUTE FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."TBYCOVER_LINE" A WHERE STARTTIME >= TRUNC({0}, 'YEAR') AND A.DEVICEID = {1} {{2}} ORDER BY STARTTIME
ROOT.ds_record_month: SELECT STARTTIME, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, MAXP AS CURVALUE, DATEDIFF(SS,STARTTIME,CASE WHEN ENDTIME IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE ENDTIME END) AS MINUTE FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."TBYCOVER_LINE" A WHERE STARTTIME >= TRUNC({0}, 'MONTH') AND A.DEVICEID = {1} {{2}} ORDER BY STARTTIME
ROOT.ds_record_day: SELECT TO_CHAR(STARTTIME,'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS STARTTIME, CASE WHEN LOADRATE > 100 THEN '过载' ELSE '重载' END AS TYPE, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, MAXP AS CURVALUE, DATEDIFF(SS, STARTTIME, CASE WHEN ENDTIME IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE ENDTIME END) AS MINUTE, STARTTIME AS REALSTARTTIME FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."TBYCOVER_LINE" A WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND A.DEVICEID = {2} {{3}} ORDER BY STARTTIME
ROOT.ds_history_record: SELECT TO_CHAR(STARTTIME,'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS STARTTIME, CASE WHEN LOADRATE > 100 THEN '过载' ELSE '重载' END AS TYPE, LOADRATE || '%' AS LOADRATE, MAXP AS CURVALUE, DATEDIFF(SS, STARTTIME, CASE WHEN ENDTIME IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE ENDTIME END) AS MINUTE, STARTTIME AS REALSTARTTIME FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."TBYCOVER_LINE" A WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND A.DEVICEID = {2} {{3}} ORDER BY STARTTIME
ROOT.ds_valuechart: select a.datatime,ifnull(b.ACTIVEVALUE, a.ACTIVEVALUE) as val1 from ( select 0 as datatime, '-' as ACTIVEVALUE from dual union all select 1, '-' from dual union all select 2, '-' from dual union all select 3, '-' from dual union all select 4, '-' from dual union all select 5, '-' from dual union all select 6, '-' from dual union all select 7, '-' from dual union all select 8, '-' from dual union all select 9, '-' from dual union all select 10, '-' from dual union all select 11, '-' from dual union all select 12, '-' from dual union all select 13, '-' from dual union all select 14, '-' from dual union all select 15, '-' from dual union all select 16, '-' from dual union all select 17, '-' from dual union all select 18, '-' from dual union all select 19, '-' from dual union all select 20, '-' from dual union all select 21, '-' from dual union all select 22, '-' from dual union all select 23, '-' from dual ) a left join ( select to_number(to_char(DATATIME,'hh24')) as datatime, round(ACTIVEVALUE,1) as ACTIVEVALUE from MONITORSIGNAL.TBLINEDAYPOINT{{3}} where DATATIME between {0} and {1} and DEVICEID={2} ) b on a.datatime=b.datatime order by a.datatime
ROOT.ds_loadratechart: SELECT CONVERT(INT,TO_CHAR(DATATIME,'HH24')) AS DATATIME, CASE WHEN DP.RATECURRENT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(TO_NUMBER(DEVICECURRENT)/DP.RATECURRENT,2)*100 END AS VAL FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBLINEDAYPOINT{{3}} A LEFT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICEPARAM" DP ON DP.DEVID = A.DEVICEID WHERE DATATIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND A.DEVICEID={2} ORDER BY DATATIME
ROOT.ds_history_loadratechart: SELECT CONVERT(INT,TO_CHAR(DATATIME,'HH24')) AS DATATIME, CASE WHEN DP.RATECURRENT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(TO_NUMBER(DEVICECURRENT)/DP.RATECURRENT,2)*100 END AS VAL FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBLINEDAYPOINT{{3}} A LEFT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICEPARAM" DP ON DP.DEVID = A.DEVICEID WHERE DATATIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND A.DEVICEID={2} ORDER BY DATATIME
ROOT.ds_history_weekchart: with basetable as (SELECT to_char(DATATIME, 'mm-dd') AS datatime ,min(to_number(ACTIVEVALUE)) AS minval ,max(to_number(ACTIVEVALUE)) AS maxval FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBLINEDAYPOINT{{3}} WHERE DATATIME BETWEEN {0} AND {1} AND DEVICEID = {2} GROUP BY to_char(DATATIME, 'mm-dd')), pNum AS (SELECT decode(b.maxval-b.minval,0,1,b.maxval-b.minval) AS val1, 0 AS val2,b.minval val3,0 val4,0 val5,b.datatime,b.maxval,b.minval FROM basetable b WHERE b.maxval>0 AND b.minval>0), nNum AS (SELECT decode(b.minval-b.maxval,0,-1,b.minval-b.maxval) AS val1, b.maxval AS val2,0 val3,0 val4,0 val5,b.datatime,b.maxval,b.minval FROM basetable b WHERE b.maxval<0 AND b.minval<0), pnNum AS (SELECT 0 val1,0 val2,0 val3,b.maxval val4,b.minval val5,b.datatime,b.maxval,b.minval FROM basetable b WHERE b.maxval>0 AND b.minval<0) SELECT * FROM (SELECT * from pNum UNION all SELECT * FROM nNum UNION all SELECT * FROM pnNum) t ORDER BY t.datatime
ROOT.ds_elecval: select DATATIME as datatime,round(abs(POWERVALUE)*0.25,1) val1 from MONITORSIGNAL.TBLINE15POINT{{3}} where DATATIME>={0} and DATATIME<={1} and DEVICEID={2} order by DATATIME
ROOT.ds_history_elecval: select DATATIME as datatime,round(abs(POWERVALUE)*0.25,1) val1 from MONITORSIGNAL.TBLINE15POINT{{3}} where DATATIME>={0} and DATATIME<={1} and DEVICEID={2} order by DATATIME
